motions.title: SLUP 22-03: Personal Care Home at 1822 Mount Vernon Road (Second Read) - DENIAL
motions.description: Second read denial of Special Land Use Permit to allow a 7-resident personal care home at 1822 Mount Vernon Road. Proposal was for up to 7 senior citizen personal care home with reduced footprint and 38.5% lot coverage. Despite staff recommendation for approval with conditions, Council voted unanimously to deny.
